name: Fardor: The Thieves Uprisng
description:
Many thefts have struck all over the seemingly peaceful land of Fardor, even to our young blacksmith apprentice Dain, which now has to recover his grandfather's weapons from a mysterious group of thieves. Intense turn-based fights await in this role-playing adventure game unraveling a huge threat every time Dain gets closer to solving his problem.

Controls.

W, A, S, and D keys of the keyboard for movement, left shift is used to sprint. The E key displays the stats, and the ESC key pauses the game. Interact with the world using the Space bar, and confirming actions in the UI using the mouse.
